But a large number remains ofuncertain clas- sification. l have assumed in the preceding remarks that many of these belong to Metropolis Augusta, among these all the coins that mention the games ΣΕΒΑΣΤΑΚΑΙΣΑΡΕΙΑ. Coins with the addition ΦΡΥ are very rare. 1 bought one at Sandukli along with a coin ol' Antioch in Pisidia.
